title: One Piece Infinity Gloves - Novel Updates
tags: Fanfiction   Male Protagonist   Transported to Another World
author: Wu Mian Qi Liang   无面凄凉
description:
'Do you want to know about the same Thanos infinity gloves?'

Right after watching the three Women's Federation premieres, Luo Qing changed his life completely because of this impulsive consumption.

……

When Luo Qing, who inexplicably crossed over into the world of Pirates, successfully embedded a devil's fruit in the golden infinity glove, he was completely confused!

What follows is a matter of happiness and anguish!

There seem to be 6 slots in this glove...

So, which 6 types of devil's fruits can be the strongest in theory?

Wait in line! One hundred thousand hot!

Don't force me to snap my fingers!>
